description: This is an abstract base controller class for API endpoints in an ASP.NET Core project, providing a helper method to retrieve the current user's ID.

classes.name: ApiControllerBase
classes.description: An abstract controller providing common API helper functionalities, such as retrieving user identity.

methods.name: GetUserId
methods.description: Retrieves the user ID from JWT claims, or returns Guid.Empty if not found or invalid.
